settings.code: We Deserve the little things - Your do not need all the things you think you need - to do all the things you feel called to do. You have all you need right now. right here - now go make life beautiful for all you care for

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>.transparent-on-top img.inline-block.lazyautosizes.lazyloaded, .transparent-on-top img.inline-block.lazyautosizes.ls-is-cached.lazyloaded {
    filter: unset;
}
.header__22 .transparent-on-top header .sf-menu-logo-bar ul.sf-nav li a {
    color: #041e3a;
}
.header__22 .icon-fill{
    fill: #000;
  }
.cus-col-container .sf__collection-container.block.mt-0.md\:mt-2\.5.lg\:mb-15.lg\:pt-7.sidebar__collapse {
    padding-top: 6rem;
}
.mw_breadcurmb_main {
    padding-top: 60px;
}
.header__22:not(.stuck) .icon-fill-cart {
    filter: unset;
}
.header__22:not(.stuck) .icon-fill-serch {
    stroke: #000;
}
.cus-hdr .mobile____menu, .mob-logo-container img {
    filter: unset;
}
.text-left {
    padding: 0px;
}
.cus_collet_desc h3 {
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.cus_collet_desc p {
    font-size: 14px;
    padding-top: 20px;
}
.connected__products__inner h2, .recently-viewed h2 {
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: 400;
}
</style>

<style>
@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {
.cus_collet_title {
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 14px;
    padding: 0;
}
.connected__products__inner h2, .recently-viewed h2 {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.cus_collet_desc h3 {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 400;
}
.cus_collet_desc p {
    font-size: 12px;
    padding-top: 20px;
}
.cus-col-container .sf__collection-container.block.mt-0.md\:mt-2\.5.lg\:mb-15.lg\:pt-7.sidebar__collapse {
    padding-top: 5rem;
}
}
</style>
